mapper.sql: TID, RISK_TRADE_TYPE, TXNSEQNO, ORDERNO, MERCHNO, MERCHNAME, CACODE, CANAME, CHNLCODE, CHNLNAME, AMOUNT, PAN, TRADE_RISK_LEVEL, CARD_ISSUER_CODE, CARD_ISSUER_NAME, ACQDATETIME, BUSICODE, BUSITYPE, RESINFO, RESCODE, STRATEGY
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_risk_trade_log
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_risk_trade_log (TID, RISK_TRADE_TYPE, TXNSEQNO, ORDERNO, MERCHNO, MERCHNAME, CACODE, CANAME, CHNLCODE, CHNLNAME, AMOUNT, PAN, TRADE_RISK_LEVEL, CARD_ISSUER_CODE, CARD_ISSUER_NAME, ACQDATETIME, BUSICODE, BUSITYPE, RESINFO, RESCODE, STRATEGY ) values (#{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{riskTradeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{txnseqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chnlcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chnlname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeRiskLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardIssuerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardIssuerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acqdatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busicode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busitype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rescode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{strategy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

TID = #{record.tid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

TXNSEQNO = #{txnseqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
